name: Do Dung Cybugs Push Code Balls
name_original: Do Dung Cybugs Push Code Balls
description:
This is a metagame game with possibly several endings if you have the wit to make it to the end. However, the thing about a game in a game about a bug that is about bugs is that you know absolutely nothing of what you're dealing with. 

And to be honest, so were we. 

 

Devs & Consultants:

  • Programming
    • Manic Walrus
    • Pengbo Li
    • Chenxue Zou
  • Game Design
    • Philotheos Du
  • Art
    • TheFuckingDog
    • Ersilia Xie
    • alpacanist
    • 33
    • Huayue Zhao
    • Yang Lan
  • Sound & Music
    • Yusheng Feng
    • Athena Yu

 

P.S. For those who came back to this page thinking "What The ..." like me when I first started the game: 

The goal is to collect enough sh*t to go to the next level, sh*t is counted in binary, which can be flipped by NOT gates, and the urine puddles will make you lose your sh*t. Some barriers cannot be broken when you have too little sh*t, and some cannot be passed with too much sh*t. It's about utilizing these things to come up with a way to reach the other side with a sh*t load of sh*t. 

Yeah I know, it's such a STEM game.
